text: Judan mɨdorozir gumazir maba uan gumazir dapaniba ko, me kantri Judan danganir mabar ikiavɨra iti. Me kamaghɨn akam baraki, Babilonɨn atrivim, Gedalia, Judan nguazimɨn, gavmanɨn gumazir dapanir faragha zuimɨn ikiasa anemɨsefe. Ezɨ gumazir kaba bar dɨkavigha Gedalian ganasa Mispan ghue. Gumazir dapanir kabar ziabar kara: Netanian otarim Ismael, Karean otarim Johanan, Tanhumetɨn otarim Seraia, a Netofan nguibamɨn gumazim, ko Makan nguazimɨn gumazim Jesania.
